abstract: Federal Judge Ralph R Erickson grants request of 13 states, initiated by North Dakota, to temporarily block Obama administration rule giving federal government jurisdiction over some smaller waterways.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge blocked an Obama administration rule that would give the federal government jurisdiction over some smaller waterways.

headline.main: North Dakota: Judge Blocks Obama Rule on Waterways
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Judge Blocks Obama Rule on Waterways

snippet: A federal judge blocked an Obama administration rule that would give the federal government jurisdiction over some smaller waterways.
